import React , {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {firestore} from '../../firebase/config' import { FaFileSignature,FaSortAmountUpAlt,FaFeatherAlt,FaBarcode, FaImage } from 'react-icons/fa' const Books = () => { const [data,setData] = useState({ ISBN: '', Bookname : '', Author: '', Category:'', Price: '', Desciprtion:'', imgUrl:'' }) const [books,setBooks] = useState([]); const [err,setErr] = useState(''); const handleAdd =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); firestore.collection("Book").add(data).then((e)=>{e.reset()}).catch((err)=>setErr(err)); } useEffect(()=>{ const unsub = firestore.collection('Book').onSnapshot((snap)=>{ let books = []; snap.forEach(doc => { books.push({...doc.data()}); }); setBooks([...books]); return () => unsub(); }); },[]) return (
handleAdd(e)}>

setData({...data, Price:e.target.value})}/>
